com.delgiudice.pokemonbattlefx.teambuilder

Class MovelistController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.delgiudice.pokemonbattlefx.teambuilder.MovelistController

  • public class MovelistController
extends java.lang.Object
    This class defines the controller which is tied to the Movelist menu.

    • Method Detail

      • initialize

        public void initialize()
        Configures UI elements as well as sorts the Movelist.
        See Also:
        initMenu(TextField, Pane)

      • initMenu

        public void initMenu(javafx.scene.control.TextField currentMoveSelectTextField,
                     javafx.scene.layout.Pane addPokemonPane)
        Initializes the Movelist menu. This should always be executed before moving to the Movelist screen.
        Parameters:
        currentMoveSelectTextField - defines to which text field should the selected move be inserted to
        addPokemonPane - defines the Pane from which this menu was entered

      • setTypeChoiceBox

        private void setTypeChoiceBox()
        Initializes the typeChoiceBox, which allows to display moves of only one Type.

      • setMoveType

        private static void setMoveType(javafx.scene.control.Label typeLabel,
                                MoveTemplate moveTemplate)
        Configures a label to represent a specific type. This method changes the background properties of the label as well as sets the appropriate text.
        Parameters:
        typeLabel - label to be modified
        moveTemplate - move template from which the type should be extracted
        See Also:
        setMoveInfo(MoveTemplate)

      • setMoveInfo

        private void setMoveInfo(MoveTemplate moveTemplate)
        Sets move information in the move preview section at the bottom of the screen.
        Parameters:
        moveTemplate - move template from which the information is extracted

      • resetMoveInfo

        private void resetMoveInfo()
        Resets the move information to default in the move preview section at the bottom of the screen.
        See Also:
        setMoveType(Label, MoveTemplate)

      • containsIgnoreCase

        public static boolean containsIgnoreCase(java.lang.String str1,
                                         java.lang.String str2)
        Checks if str2 is contained inside str1. Case-insensitive.
        Parameters:
        str1 - first string
        str2 - second string
        Returns:
        true if str2 is contained inside str1, false otherwise

      • populateMoveGrid

        public void populateMoveGrid()
        Populates the grid with moves that match the requirements set by the other settings, such as Subtype or Type.

      • initButtonListeners

        public void initButtonListeners()
        Initializes button listeners, which defines visual changes to the button depending on user action.

      • enableAllButtons

        private void enableAllButtons()
        Enables all category buttons.

      • gridDisplayAllMoves

        public void gridDisplayAllMoves()
        Refreshes grid. Sets to display moves of all subtypes.
        See Also:
        populateMoveGrid()

      • gridDisplayPhysicalMoves

        public void gridDisplayPhysicalMoves()
        Refreshes grid. Sets to display physical moves.
        See Also:
        populateMoveGrid()

        public void gridDisplaySpecialMoves()
        Refreshes grid. Sets to display special moves.
        See Also:
        populateMoveGrid()

        public void gridDisplayStatusMoves()
